title: BackgroundTask to trigger at user selected time
body: An essential and very beneficial feature, that a background task should be triggered at a fixed time selected by the user. Example, An app, that allows users to select a time i.e; Tomorrow 10,30 AM to do "something". User can also choose to run "everyday, every week, etc".

comments.body: I am also facing similar issue with the background task time trigger. Time Trigger does not support scheduling task on a daily, weekly or monthly basis.
I can't believe that this feedback just leaved alone for several years.
